changes.description: Improve inputs documentation and organization.

changes.description: Standardize blueprint structure and input naming across the collection.

changes.description: Improve blueprint documentation.

changes.author: @EPMatt
changes.description: Update controller names in the Controller Model input to match full controller names, prevent ambiguities and enable alternate mappings. After updating, reconfigure automations by selecting the correct controller name.

changes.author: @EPMatt
changes.description: Add support for IKEA E1766 TRÃ…DFRI Open/Close Remote.

changes.author: @EPMatt
changes.description: Add support for Xiaomi WXCJKG11LM, WXCJKG12LM, and WXCJKG13LM.

changes.author: @EPMatt
changes.description: Add support for Xiaomi WXKG11LM.

changes.author: @EPMatt
changes.description: Add support for SONOFF SNZB-01.

changes.author: @yarafie
changes.description: Migrate to Zigbee2MQTT MQTT Device Triggers. The `controller_entity` input is deprecated and `controller_device` is now mandatory. Remove `controller_entity` from your automation and configure `controller_device` with your controller device ID. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))

changes.author: @EPMatt
changes.description: Add support for Xiaomi WXKG01LM Mi Wireless Switch and rename Xiaomi WXKG11LM Aqara Wireless Switch Mini to Aqara WXKG11LM Wireless Mini Switch. Update the `controller_model` input accordingly if needed.

changes.author: @yarafie
changes.description: Add support for IKEA E2201 RODRET Dimmer. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))

changes.author: @yarafie
changes.description: Add support for IKEA E2213 SOMRIG shortcut button. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))

changes.author: @yarafie
changes.description: Add support for IKEA E2123 SYMFONISK sound remote, gen 2. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))

changes.author: @yarafie
changes.description: Added support for Shelly Button 1. ([@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))

changes.author: @yarafie
changes.description: Added support for Aqara WXKG13LM Wireless Mini Switch T1. ([@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))

changes.author: @yarafie
changes.description: Added support for IKEA E2001/E2002 STYRBAR Remote control. ([@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))

changes.author: @yarafie
changes.description: Device Name and Model was corrected for both Aqara WXKG11LM and Xiaomi WXKG01LM. Blueprints integrated with these two devices will need to be redownloaded and setup again.
